name: 4 DAYS (DHMelon)
description:
4 Days is a game about a group of high school students dealing with the guilt of covering up a murder committed by one of their friends. You have to reveal the true mystery of this murder and convince everyone in the group to confess in 4 days before all of you graduate and leave for college.

Gameplay

During the game which characters you speak to and when determines how the story unfolds. Try to pay attention to small details and who's with who to not provoke anyone.

DISCLAIMER: As this was my first time making a game with an actual story and structure this game is really short and doesn't have a complex gameplay loop. DISCLAIMER 2: There are some typos in Day 3. I've used up all 168 hours so I cannot correct them anymore.
